title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (S.I. No. 79 of 2020); 

“Regulations of 2024” means the European Union (Official Controls in relation 
to Food Legislation) (Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 9 of 2024).

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 3. Regulation 13(2)(a) of the Principal Regulations is amended by
text_raw:
3. Regulation 13(2)(a) of the Principal Regulations is amended by 

substituting “close and seal” for “seal and fasten”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 13(2)(a) principal regulation amended substituting close seal seal fasten

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 4. Regulation 14(2) (as amended by Regulation 7(a) of the Regulations of
text_raw:
4. Regulation 14(2) (as amended by Regulation 7(a) of the Regulations of 
2024) of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting for subparagraph 
(a) the following: 

“(a) 

in the presence of the operator, or the person in apparent charge 
or control of the relevant thing, mark, close and seal each 
relevant thing, copy or photograph, in such a manner as its 
nature will permit, and in such a way that the integrity of the 
sample is not compromised,”.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give further effect to Regulation (EU) 2017/625 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 15 March 2017 on official controls 
and other official activities. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020) in the manner 
specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [106] 5
